io.spine.core

Interface EventMixin

  • All Superinterfaces:
    io.spine.validate.FieldAwareMessage, com.google.protobuf.Message, com.google.protobuf.MessageLite, com.google.protobuf.MessageLiteOrBuilder, com.google.protobuf.MessageOrBuilder, Signal<io.spine.core.EventId,io.spine.base.EventMessage,io.spine.core.EventContext>

    @Immutable
public interface EventMixin
extends Signal<io.spine.core.EventId,io.spine.base.EventMessage,io.spine.core.EventContext>, io.spine.validate.FieldAwareMessage
    Mixin interface for event objects.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.google.protobuf.Message

        com.google.protobuf.Message.Builder

      • rootMessage

        default io.spine.core.MessageId rootMessage()
        Description copied from interface: Signal
        Obtains the ID of the first message in the chain.

        The root message is always produced by an actor directly. Tenant and actor of the root message define the tenant and actor of the whole chain.

        Specified by:
        rootMessage in interface Signal<io.spine.core.EventId,io.spine.base.EventMessage,io.spine.core.EventContext>

      • origin

        default java.util.Optional<io.spine.core.Origin> origin()
        Description copied from interface: Signal
        Obtains the origin of this signal.
        Specified by:
        origin in interface Signal<io.spine.core.EventId,io.spine.base.EventMessage,io.spine.core.EventContext>
        Returns:
        origin of this signal or Optional.empty() if this signal is posted directly by an actor

      • rootCommandId

        default io.spine.core.CommandId rootCommandId()
        Obtains the ID of the root command, which lead to this event.

        In case the Event is a reaction to another Event, the identifier of the very first command in this chain is returned.

        Returns:
        the root command ID

      • isRejection

        default boolean isRejection()
        Checks if this event is a rejection.
        Returns:
        true if the given event is a rejection, false otherwise
